H0.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Hand

H1.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Wrist

H2.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Elbow

H3.text: Where would you find the metatarsal bone. Foot

A4.text: The metatarsal bones or metatarsus (pl. : metatarsi) are a group of five long bones in the midfoot

A5.text: The metatarsals are the bones that make up the main part of the foot in humans, and part of the leg in large animals or paw in smaller animals.

A6.text: The forefoot is composed of five toes and the corresponding five proximal long bones forming the metatarsus.
